overview: Fall in for the first ever film in the highly successful Carry On comedy series—now an acclaimed British institution. Kenneth Connor and Charles Hawtrey are the prankish misfits who become the hilarious bane of Army Officers existence when he makes a bet he will turn them into ‘Star Squad’ Award soldiers—or bust!
tagline: It’s all about a Dad . . . a Draftee . . . and a Detonation heard round the camp!
title: Carry On Sergeant
